verbs.description: Despite [ARG1: tariffs] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: President Trump] [V: imposed] [ARG2: on imported panels] , the U.S. installed more solar energy than any other source of electricity in the first quarter .
Despite tariffs that President Trump imposed on [V: imported] [ARG1: panels] , the U.S. installed more solar energy than any other source of electricity in the first quarter .
